column4: I have a Canon IP4500 that I want to use with Ubuntu 10.10. No x64 bit driver (or for 10.10 at all for that matter). What do I do?
last canonprinter i used.. dident need drivers from canon. the drivers were allready there in some packages in the repos
So what did you do? I've connected the printer, but it won't work.
check the foruyms for your exact make/model printer. check  the cups.org site and linuxprinting.org site also it may give a clue if theres extra packages you need.
